newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexican daily port, shipping update for June 20.
newsitem.headline: Mexican daily port, shipping update for June 20.

text.p: All Mexican ports were open on Friday, the Communications and Transport Ministry (SCT) said in its 1500 local/2000 GMT daily meteorological report.
The ministry updated port conditions and shipping warnings for the Pacific Coast, Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean.

Hot and clear skies with maximum winds 10 to 15 knots (19 to 28 km/11 to 16 miles per hour) and waves three to five feet high. Possible light rains along coasts of Michoacan, Jalisco, Colima, Guerrero and Oaxaca.
Partly cloudy and possible rains over Tamaulipas and Veracruz states. Winds from 10 to 15 knots and waves three to five feet high.
Clear skies in Quintana Roo and regional winds about 10 to 15 knots.
Rains expected along Nicaragua, Panama and Costa Rica.
